PHRASE.LANG: Bata de laboratorio de científico loco (hombre)
You have to wonder how these mad scientists always manage to keep their coats so clean. [#Legal]
On se demande bien comment les savants fous arrivent à garder leur blouse toujours aussi propre. [#Legal]
Wieso schaffen es diese verrückten Wissenschaftler immer, dass ihre Kittel so sauber bleiben?! [#Legal]
Chissà come fanno questi scienziati svitati ad avere sempre camici così puliti. [#Legal]
Uno se pregunta cómo es que estos científicos locos tienen siempre tan limpias las batas. [#Legal]
You have to wonder how these mad scientists always manage to keep their coats so clean. [#Legal]
